Yeah, looks like we have a problem here. But, if someoner can find the registry entry for the new 747-400F. maybe we can solve this problem.. like another crack for the 747-400.  If someone know a friend who maybe have this new PMDG. try to take a look inside his aircraft.cfg file, anf look after those lines:
[AFDSAuth]
---BEGIN SHA1---

---END SHA1---

Copy that longe code/key and we have to make a new .reg file to install manually to the correct registry entry. It's worked for PMDG 747-400. And i can see this new aircraft.cfg have the same key/code as the old aircraft.cfg from PMDG 747-400... Just an idea :)
